activities.activity_name: Meet and Greet at Denny Park
activities.description: Begin the adventure at Denny Park for introductions and group orientation.
Enjoy a scenic ride to Lake Union Park on rented bikes or scooters. Explore the park's amenities, including its green spaces, walking paths, and waterfront views.

activities.activity_name: Visit to the Museum of History & Industry (MOHAI)
activities.activity_location: Museum of History & Industry, Seattle, WA
activities.description: Take a tour of the MOHAI to learn about Seattle's rich history and industry.

activities.activity_name: Game Time at Cherry Street Coffee
activities.activity_location: Cherry Street Coffee, 2719 1st Ave, Seattle, WA 98121
activities.description: Ride over to Cherry Street Coffee. Relax and engage in a spirited game of Monopoly while enjoying some great coffee and pastries.
Enjoy a leisurely ride along Westlake Ave, soaking in the vibrant city atmosphere.

activities.activity_location: REI Seattle Flagship Store, Seattle, WA
activities.description: End the tour at the REI flagship store. Explore the store or grab a snack at the cafe.
